questions.question: 駅（＿）　人が　たくさん　います。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～に います - location of existence (for people)

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「駅に人がいます」 means “There are people at the station.”

  • を - object marker
  • で - place of action, not used with いる/ある
  • が - subject marker, not for location
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer
The correct answer is に.

  • を - object marker
  • で - place of action, not used with いる/ある
  • が - subject marker, not for location

questions.question: いぬ（＿）　にくを　あげました。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～に あげる - to give to someone/something

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「犬にあげました」 = “I gave meat to the dog.”

  • が - subject marker
  • は - topic marker
  • を - object marker (used for what is given)
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer
The correct answer is に.

  • が - subject marker
  • は - topic marker
  • を - object marker (used for what is given)

questions.question: へや（＿）　エアコンが　ついています。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～に ついています - something is on/in a location

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「へやにエアコンがついています」 = “There is an air conditioner on in the room.”

  • を - object marker
  • は - topic marker
  • と - “with” or “and”
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer
The correct answer is に.

  • を - object marker
  • は - topic marker
  • と - “with” or “and”

questions.question: このかばんは　山田さん（＿）です。

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「山田さんのです」 = “It belongs to Mr./Ms. Yamada.”

  • が - subject marker
  • を - object marker
  • に - direction or recipient
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer
The correct answer is の.

  • が - subject marker
  • を - object marker
  • に - direction or recipient

questions.question: 私は　先生（＿）　ききました。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～に 聞く - to ask someone

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「先生にききました」 = “I asked the teacher.”

  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker
  • で - location marker
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer
The correct answer is に.

  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker
  • で - location marker

questions.question: 田中さん（＿）　ピアノが　じょうずです。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～は ～が 上手 - A is good at B

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「田中さんはピアノが上手です」 = “Tanaka is good at piano.”

  • に - indirect marker
  • を - object marker
  • が - marks the skill (ピアノ), not Tanaka
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer
The correct answer is は.

  • に - indirect marker
  • を - object marker
  • が - marks the skill (ピアノ), not Tanaka
